title: Kaguya: Tsuki no Usagi no Gin no Hakobune
original_name: Kaguya 〜月のウサギの銀の箱舟〜
sinopse: The main character has the super natural ability to 'let others see what he has seen.' Always hiding his special ability and living a normal life, he meets an unbelievable teenage girl in front of his apartment one day.
